title: Sentry插件的问题
author: 丶米饭
txt_content:
Sentry插件我制作了一个士兵


然后  打一下就提示你


 Miss: "&7*** You MISS <NPC>."
 Hit: "&f*** You hit <NPC> for <AMOUNT> damage."
 Crit1: "&e*** You injure <NPC> for <AMOUNT> damage."
 Crit2: "&6*** You MAIM <NPC> with your <ITEM> for <AMOUNT> damage."
 Crit3: "&c*** You DISEMBOWEL <NPC> with your <ITEM> for <AMOUNT> damage."
 Block: "&7*** You fail to penetrate <NPC>'s armor."
 Glance: "&7*** Your blow glances off <NPC> for <AMOUNT> damage."



反正就是这些消息中的一个。。


我就想问！怎么能不提示，要不我弄个100血的士兵，玩家打一下提示一下刷屏的要死要死的！！！！

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
打开Sentry的配置文件，找到
GlobalTexts:
 Miss: "&7*** You MISS <NPC>."
 Hit: "&f*** You hit <NPC> for <AMOUNT> damage."
 Crit1: "&e*** You injure <NPC> for <AMOUNT> damage."
 Crit2: "&6*** You MAIM <NPC> with your <ITEM> for <AMOUNT> damage."
 Crit3: "&c*** You DISEMBOWEL <NPC> with your <ITEM> for <AMOUNT> damage."
 Block: "&7*** You fail to penetrate <NPC>'s armor."
 Glance: "&7*** Your blow glances off <NPC> for <AMOUNT> damage."复制代码
改成
GlobalTexts:
 Miss: ""
 Hit: ""
 Crit1: ""
 Crit2: ""
 Crit3: ""
 Block: ""
 Glance: ""复制代码
为什么内，因为 Remove a message or set it to "" to prevent it from displaying at all.

replies.author: 丶米饭
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2016-6-6 04:26
打开Sentry的配置文件，找到

改成
{:10_493:}噗噗噗，你确定不刷空格刷屏吗
